name: d12 Streamlined: A Simple Steampunk TTRPG
name_original: d12 Streamlined: A Simple Steampunk TTRPG
description:
A Simple and Versatile, Free Tabletop RPG

This was a very short, very simple, very cute and colorful tabletop RPG system designed with three things in mind: to be easy to learn, to be fast to run, and to use d12's (twelve-sided dice). This system was inspired by me sitting one night at work and watching the Yogscast play their Yogsquest tabletop game series and I wanted to make a quick, cheap, and easy system. And now that it's done, here it is!

Included is a two-page document that details character creation, running the game. And a character sheet in .png format.

While I'm offering this system out for free. Tips are always appreciated! :D
